title: Why Is Luka Doncic Not Playing Tonight vs Timberwolves? Unfortunate Update on Mavs Star After Cavs Stinger - EssentiallySports
text: Why Is Luka Doncic Not Playing Tonight vs Timberwolves? Unfortunate Update on Mavs Star After Cavs Stinger [](https://bit.ly/4113QfS) Follow Us The Dallas Mavericks had a loss to the severely shorthanded Cavaliers yesterday. Fans were none too happy with how the fierce showdown had a shocking turn towards the end. While Luka Doncic had another splendid night with 39 points, it wasn’t enough to pull the Mavs to safety. America’s Favorite Video Today Tonight, as Dallas is getting ready to face off against the Western Conference top-seeded Timberwolves, the Mavs PR has released a concerning injury update. Doncic will be absent from the game due to left quad soreness. And it doesn’t stop there. Kyrie Irving and Maxi Kleber are also still sidelined from right heel contusion and right small toe dislocation, respectively. Luka Dončić (left quad soreness), Kyrie Irving (right heel contusion) and Maxi Kleber (right small toe dislocation) will be OUT tonight against the Timberwolves. — Mavs PR (@MavsPR) [December 28, 2023] (This story is still developing) Providing feedback will help us make your experience better.
